title: Behind the Code
sub_title: My mission is to connect people with technology through programming and digital content — creating experiences that inspire, educate, and transform.

description.title: The road so far
description.begin: Nice to meet you! My name is Felipe Frantz Zanini, a software engineer passionate about jiu-jitsu, running, indie game development, Dota 2, storytelling, pixel art, music, and investments. I'm 31 years old and currently live in Pelotas, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
description.middle: My journey in software development began in 2008, during technical school. In 2010, after finishing the course, I started my first internship in programming and have never stopped learning and evolving. After being hired as a software engineer, I took part in more than 50 projects, using various technologies, with an emphasis on PHP.
description.education: Passionate about the field and always looking to improve, I earned a Bachelor's Degree in IT Management and a Specialization in IT Management. I also started a Master's in Computer Science.
description.end: I currently work as a Senior Software Engineer & Tech Lead specializing in frontend development at nav9, where I have the privilege of being a tech partner to several companies such as Shoppings Iguatemi, UFC Fantasy, EducaCross, Grupo SEB, Rede AZ, Vittude, supporting them in building the best product solutions for the web.

skills.title: From imagination to impact
skills.subtitle: A look into my process for turning ideas into digital products

process.title: Understanding the motivation
process.description: Everything starts with a good conversation. I listen to your ideas, understand your needs and motivations, translate them into something practical, and think about the best way to turn them into something visually appealing and functional.

process.title: Building the structure
process.description: Before thinking about looks, I define the structure of the project: which pages are needed, how the elements will behave, and how everything will be logically and efficiently connected.

process.title: Bringing code to life
process.description: Time to bring the project to life! I develop interfaces focused on usability, responsiveness, and performance. Each element is optimized to work well on any device, ensuring fast loading and smooth navigation.

process.title: External integrations
process.description: When the project needs forms, authentication, or integration with other systems, I've got that covered too — always focusing on security, stability, and reliability.

process.title: Testing and quality assurance
process.description: Before launching, I perform various tests to ensure everything works as expected — across different browsers, devices, resolutions, and usage contexts.

process.title: Time to go live!
process.description: To wrap it all up, I publish the project and make sure everything is ready for the world to see — keeping an eye out and providing support in the first few days to fix any detail that might come up.

stack.title: The gears behind the process
stack.description: Behind every click and line of code are technologies chosen with care and purpose. If you'd like to see the full stack or send a message, just click the buttons below.

site.title: Coffee, code & deploy
site.subtitle: A technical summary of the technologies and tools that make this site truly mine — everything that happened behind the clicks.
site.description: This site was developed using Mobile First concepts, with the Next.js framework, deployed via Vercel, styled using Tailwind, animated with Framer-Motion, and featuring icons from React Icons.
